text: In a triumphant display of bravery, Grudgbringers, the indomitable Mercenary, reclaims the settlement from the clutches of foul creatures, restoring it to the rightful hands of the faction of order. The townsfolk cheer as hope reignites, and tales of Grudgbringers' valor spread far and wide, inspiring all who hear of this heroic feat.

My true name is Ceridan of the Black Mountains. My identity as Ilmarin no longer serves a purpose. I require your help in a quest handed down through generations of my family to protect the Menhir and stop the Skaven menace.
